name: There is a new setting in the rules.2da to put a time limit on HiPS
author: webshaman1

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Heads up, folks!

There is now an official entry in the rules.2da that causes HiPS to have a cooldown when activated.  One can set the cooldown time limit.

So just a heads up, who knows what Mod makers might implement.

It is now active on WoG.

posts.author: Ant_
posts.content: Wasnt it on 6sec CD for quite a while now on WOG?

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Yes, it was done by TheKrit way back when.

But this is now a setting directly in the rules.2da that can be accessed.
